HTMLElementScriptTypeSpeculationrules.summary: The speculationrules value of the type attribute of the <script> element indicates that the body of the element contains speculation rules.

remarks.para: Speculation rules take the form of a JSON structure that determine what resources should be prefetched or prerendered by the browser. This is part of the Speculation Rules API.

-Prerender pages in Chrome for instant page navigations on developer.chrome.com (2023)
-Speculative loading
-Speculation Rules API
